name: Acute Hypertensive Crisis with End-Organ Damage
chief_complaint: I have a terrible headache and can't see clearly
prognosis: Guarded - depends on speed of BP control and extent of organ damage. Risk of permanent vision loss, renal impairment, or cardiac injury.
description: A life-threatening elevation of blood pressure causing acute damage to target organs (eyes, brain, heart, kidneys). Often occurs in patients with chronic hypertension who miss medications or have secondary causes.
